Articles.Content: Just to clarify, yes all my mods are installed correctly. Valentina appears to be a Male Kerbal in my career mode. IVA cam shows a male, in the Astronaut complex she appears to be a man too. That's not all. Every other FemKerbal is female with the female model too. It isn't game breaking. It just bothers me and I'd love if there was some way to fix it without restarting my Career mode save.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122922-Problem-with-gender-swapping](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122922-Problem-with-gender-swapping)

Someone just helped me solve the same problem. If you have texture replacer installed that's what's causing the problem, there's 2 locations in the save file that you have to switch.
